sourceDesc.p: A TEI file created from Ethio-Spare data

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.settlement: wäräda Gulo Mäkäda, ṭabiya ʾAmbäsätä Foqäda, qušät ʾAmbäsät

note.ab: Däbr. The old rock-hewn church dedicated to Mäṭṭaʿ/Libanos, below, located in a hardly accessible place and is now deserted. The church of Kidanä Mǝḥrät was built in 1930s, specifically in more accessible place near the road. Tabots (2): Libanos, Kidanä Mǝḥrät.

28 Mss. photographed: AKM-001 "Four Gospels"; AKM-001m magic scroll; AKM-002 "Missal; two fragments"; AKM-002m magic scroll; AKM-003 "Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus"; AKM-003m magic scroll; AKM-004 "Vita of Libanos"; AKM-004m magic scroll; AKM-005 "The Book of the Baptismal Rite"; AKM-006 "The Rite of the Holy Week"; AKM-007 "Book of Qedǝr"; AKM-008 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; AKM-009 "Missal"; AKM-010 "Story of St. Mary; Homily of St. Uraʾel"; AKM-011 "Book of ʾAsläṭi"; AKM-012 "The Covenant of Grace"; AKM-013 "Prayer of Mary"; AKM-014 "Collection of Prayers; two fragments"; AKM-015 "Miracles of Mary"; AKM-015a "Psalter"; AKM-016 "Miracles of Mary"; AKM-017 "Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus"; AKM-018 "Book of the Diciples"; AKM-019 "The Anaphora of Mary"; AKM-020 "The Anaphora of Mary"; AKM-021 "Collection of Mälkǝʿ-Poetry for Mary"; AKM-022 "collection of protective texts"; AKM-023 "Missal".
